text: now mr. Putin was met in the Minister of
Foreign Affairs and the defense minister
of Russia and indeed he said that
starting immediately starting from
tomorrow the main the the main part of
the Russian forces in Syria will be
starting to to get back to their bases
in Russia he also said that this is you
that to the fact that the main
objectives of this operation has now
been achieved and that that is why this
decision is justified when they say
objectives have been achieved what
exactly do we know about what those
objectives were this is a very
interesting and probably the most
controversial question because as we
know Moscow was always saying that the
main object it was fighting Isis and
other Islamist radical groups in Syria
at the same time many people in the West
and within Russia open and so mr. Putin
was saying that his prime objective was
supporting mr. Assad and gave him some
military advantage in Syria if we are
talking about whether Russia helped to
defeat Isis well probably not as we know
the the group is still in operation
there as for the advantage for mr. Assad
forces then that might be the answer
might be yes because Syrian government
forces are largely in control of more
territories than they used to be when
Russia step into this conflict what is
the extent of Russian military
involvement in Syria well this is
basically airstrikes which generated
from the base in Syria itself but we
also knew that Russia for example used
this high-tech missiles launched from
the Caspian Sea and we also know that
there are military advisers operational
on the ground to help in Assad forces
with some intelligence advise with
training etc so what we can understand
from the words main forces to be
withdrawn it's not clear yet but as the
main part was currently rely on air
forces Russian air forces we can assume
at least from now with this
information we have that it's all about
air forces and the timing of this
announcement is very interesting
considering that peace talks regarding
Syria are restarting right now in Geneva
well I believe there will be lots and
lots of governments from various
political sides and parties at this
moment because this is a definitely it's
a time the announcement but will it add
the the way to the idea that this is a
pure political statement probably yes
but also this is two very significant
degree it was always political gesture
from Russia to step into this conflict
in order to balance you know its
positions with the general hostile
relationships with the West and mr.
Putin was always trying to balance his
role in Syria with problems back at home
back in Europe in Ukraine the the crisis
of Crimea etc and he was always saying
that all right we have lots of problems
here but in Syria at least we can
negotiate because we have common goals
